attributes.action: Make a full withdrawel from the European Union.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, as an island nation should have full and total control over the political desicions that will have an effect over the British people.  We must not surrender all that was fought for over two world wars on a whim. our history and our traditions must cease to be erroded through selfish and bureaucratic european policy makers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
